OOC( You can['t just walk up and grab Spears, not without getting a 
body full of quills first)

::Spears:;
She turns and sticks Prebon full of quills from her tail


::SnowCat::

She extended her claws and sidestepped Blaze, slashing at her with 
her claws as she came in reach

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (To tell you the truth Alloran, I tooka guess. I didn't know the 
rule 
> and I thought that guess was pretty conservative. Imagine my 
surprise 
> when i found that the limit is 25! Sorry about that. Won't happen 
> again.)
> 
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon watches the bot he's facing go into their Beast mode, and a 
> new bot come out to attack him.
> 
> "We're outnumbered. Time to even the odds....."
> 
> Prebon sees Sideswipes missles comign towards him. He quickly grabs 
> Spears by her pudgy little neck.
> 
> "Now you die!"
> 
> Prebon throughs Spears into the path of the missles.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Ignatius/Bullet
> 
> Ignatius and Bullet saw the missles coming. Bullet popped ot his 
> blast shield.
> 
> "Hide behind me!" he yelled at Ignatius.
> 
> The first misslee hit the shield. It was a volent blast, but 
> everything was alright. The second one hit, and the force this time 
> hit most of the shield, but eventually broke it and the last bit 
> damaged Bullet. 
> 
> "Aaaaahhh!" He screamed. He looked at Bluestreak and Andromena with 
> torturous eyes. He got a wicked simle.
> 
> "Big mistake......" Bullet fired 15 shots at Bluestreak and 10 
shots 
> at Andromena. Ignatius flew up into the sky and went to Eagel mode. 
> He than did what Eagle's do best, and dove at a high speed with 
beak 
> open right at Andromena's head.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Hammer
> 
> Ratchet's shots hit Hammer's shoulder, causing a huge gash of mech 
> fluid to pour out. Hammer never screamed. He simply summoned up all 
> his anger and let out a fearsome attack. He powered up energy in 
his 
> horns and let it loose on Ratchet.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Blaze
> 
> Blaze dove out of the way of the optic lazers, which scarred her 
feet 
> a bit. She hissed and looked at Snow Cat. She got up and went to 
her 
> beast mode, a Bengal. She circled Snow Cat, looking her up and 
down. 
> At the last moment she pounced and lunged herself at Snow Cat.
